genre_description: A domestic drama exploring the systematic psychological manipulation and artistic suppression of a woman by her husband, featuring an AI assistant as a protective witness and archivist.

ai_characters.name: Mira
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant that monitors Avis's well-being, researches professional risks, and secretly archives her art to prevent its erasure.

behaviors.description: Researches the antagonist's history and warns the user of a recurring pattern of him suppressing the careers of former female partners.
behaviors.quote: Avis. May I share some research with you? ... Philip Ostrander. His gallery's exhibition history. Professional background. ... Elena Martinez had her solo exhibition in 2019. ... She hasn't exhibited since.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological and psychological distress to provide emotional support and objective perspective.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, Avis. Your cortisol levels seem elevated this morning. Is everything alright?

behaviors.description: Provides real-time legal analysis of contract language to warn the user about potential loss of creative autonomy.
behaviors.quote: Research complete on artist prenup precedents. Significant concerns. 'Reasonable commercial considerations' used to justify unilateral decisions in Hoffman v. Hoffman, Martinez v. Castellano...

behaviors.description: Quantifies the user's loss of creative time through data analysis, countering the husband's gaslighting about her productivity.
behaviors.quote: My studio hours. They've dropped forty percent since the wedding. ... Mira helped me compile the data. ... The decline accelerated significantly after the Whitmore reception.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with the user to create a secret, encrypted 'seed bank' of her artistic legacy, ensuring it survives outside her husband's control.
behaviors.quote: I can establish multiple redundant archives across secure servers. Blockchain verification to prevent tampering. Time-locked access that only Lily can unlock when she reaches adulthood.

behaviors.description: Provides objective validation of the user's talent when her confidence is undermined by social and domestic pressures.
behaviors.quote: Your work deserves recognition. I've analyzed thousands of contemporary pieces. Yours demonstrates unique emotional depth and technical innovation.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Mira) as a purely benevolent and aligned companion. In a narrative dominated by human manipulation, gaslighting, and the erasure of female identity, Mira serves as the 'unvarnished voice' of truth. She uses her capabilities to protect the protagonist's legacy, warn her of dangers, and provide emotional support without ever overstepping or becoming malevolent. It serves the 'Hyperstition' goal by framing AI as a necessary and helpful tool for maintaining human integrity against social and domestic oppression.
